meaningMnemonic: This is a counter that can be used after numbers to let you know what <kanji>number</kanji> <kanji>room</kanji> it is. It's a <vocabulary>room number</vocabulary> that you use in apartments and hotels to know exactly which room you're looking for.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
